name: SUPER RED - Ludum Dare 48
description:
WARNING: There are spiders and other bugs in this game, but they are friendly.

You are SUPER RED the composting worm with a dream. Escape your vermicomposting life and find a fresher food. The deeper you go the darker it gets? I wanted to focus more on the mood of the game for this one through music. I didn’t get to add as many details as I hoped, but I think its still a pretty rich world. Not a very interactive world in this state though. Hope you find it interesting! I think it could be a fun exploring type game with some more work.

Controls:

WASD - Move 

Shift - Move faster 

MouseWheel - Adjust Zoom level to see larger portions of the level 

Escape - Exit to menu
